name: @antv/g2
description: the Grammar of Graphics in Javascript
author: https://github.com/orgs/antvis/people

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && npm run build
scripts.test-live: npm run pretest && npm run lint && electron-mocha interactive ./test

scripts.prepublish: npm run test && npm run dist
